alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Brunswick; Columbus; Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 3:52PM EST until January 09 at 4:30PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EST FOR WESTERN PENDER...SOUTHEASTERN BLADEN...NORTHWESTERN BRUNSWICK AND NORTHEASTERN COLUMBUS COUNTIES... At 352 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sandyfield, or 19 miles northwest of Leland, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Rowan, Lake Waccamaw, Northwest, Sandyfield, Penderlea, Makatoka, Point Caswell, Freeland, Exum, Currie, Wards Corner, Ash, The Borough, Riegelwood, Carvers, Honey Island, Montague, Rooks, Malpass Corner, and Willard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for southeastern North Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
